body.p: When editing LESS files, you can compile the files into CSS. provides both manual and automatic options to compile LESS stylesheets into CSS.

You have two options for compiling LESS files to CSS:
To use the contextual menu in a LESS file and select Compile to CSS (or the shortcut Ctrl+Shift+C).
Enable the option Automatically compile LESS to CSS when saving in the settings. To do so and go to Editor Open Save Save hooks . If checked, when saving a LESS file, it will automatically be compiled to CSS (this options is off by default).When this option is enabled, the CSS file that has the same name as the LESS file is overwritten, without warning, each time you save the LESS file. Make sure all your changes are made in the LESS file. Do not edit the CSS file directly, as your changes might be lost.
